Articles.Content: the hillverse is highly unstable and has destroyed itself at least 50 times anyway. my megaverse/hillverse

I format the computer's data and start over again.

---------------------------------------

My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-11T15:46:38Z" title="10/11/2014 03:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">October 11, 2014</time> by alemagno12**

I fire a transformation beam at alemagno's hill, turning it into a 300km mudflat which I am now in the middle of.

My 300km mudflat.

I reconstruct my hill and build a bunker on it.

My hill and bunker.

I still have my mudflat, which I wade around in until I get stuck.

My mudflat with rubber boots stuck in the middle of it.

I build another hill and another bunker in your mudflat.

My two hills and bunkers ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I blow up your hills and bunkers.... and antimatter-bomb Alemagno so he can't build more.

My rubber boots stuck in the middle of a mudflat.

The mud soon dries up and the boots find themselves in the middle of a Death Valley of sorts...

soon, the temperatures cause the rubber to burn and melt.

My flat land with some burnt rubber.

I nuke your flat land.

My crater?

A huge desert storm buries you and forms a hill on your crater.

No one's hill (and... ergh...).

I take the hill and build a bunker on it.

My hill and bunker.

I bust your bunker.

No one's hill with a small crater.

I rebuild the bunker.

My hill and bunker.
I kill you and destroy your bunker, and turn the hulk into a volcano. My hulk-volcano.

The hulk volcano buries you when it erupts.

No one's hulk-volcano.

I plug my former volcano with plastic, and make a deep mud pit next to it, which I leave a pair if chest waders in.

My pair of chest waders stuck in a deep mud pit.

I install a supergate in orbit around Eve and collapse it into a black hole to power the gate and invade the Kerbol System and convert all Kerbals to worship the Ori religion (SG reference). A fleet of 7 [Ori Warships](http://media.moddb.com/images/members/1/370/369143/oriMotherShip_01_1.jpg) is also stationned in case of attack.

My solar system.

(I will also expand my territory over the entire galaxy shortly)

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-13T14:39:04Z" title="10/13/2014 02:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">October 13, 2014</time> by MegaUZI**

Hey, what about my claims?

My chest waders stuck in mud.
my megaverse whose inhabitants my leave for that universe but do not want to

Hey, what about my claims?

My chest waders stuck in mud.

Not going to stop posting this until someone does something to it.

> 
> Hey, what about my claims?
> My chest waders stuck in mud.

An Ori fighter in patrol notices the volcano and alerts HQ, who sends a squad to check it out. They find a chest in it and open it to find out what's inside. They find you inside and kill you for hiding during the invasion.

My volcano (which was on already claimed territory)

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-13T14:44:56Z" title="10/13/2014 02:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">October 13, 2014</time> by MegaUZI**
  
NINJA'ED YOU/ME !

I blow up the volcano, find a hill by my house, make a mud pit at the top of it, get my chest waders stuck in it, and put a force field around the hill.

My chest waders stuck in mud at the top of a hill that has a force field around it.
my megaverse inhabitants laughing at the inability of your universes inhabitants to explore the universe for hills

I take all of the multiverses, hillverses, and everything, the infinity and beyond ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

My...everything?

YOU CHEATER!

My chest waders stuck in mud at the top of a hill that has a force field around it.
